name: Bad Request
description: Client gửi dữ liệu sai định dạng hoặc thiếu trường bắt buộc.
fix_recommendation: Validate input using Zod/Pydantic before processing. Return clear validation messages.

name: Unauthorized
description: Client chưa xác thực hoặc token hết hạn/không hợp lệ.
fix_recommendation: Check Authorization header. If JWT expired

name: Forbidden
description: Client đã xác thực nhưng không có quyền truy cập tài nguyên này (RBAC).
fix_recommendation: Log security audit. Check user permissions/scopes. Do NOT retry.

name: Not Found
description: Tài nguyên không tồn tại.
fix_recommendation: Return standard 404 response. Ensure ID format is valid before querying.

name: Conflict
description: Xung đột trạng thái (VD: Email đã tồn tại).
fix_recommendation: Check for unique constraints. Suggest user specific field to change.

name: Unprocessable Entity
description: Dữ liệu đúng cú pháp nhưng sai về mặt ngữ nghĩa (VD: password quá ngắn).
fix_recommendation: Provide field-level error details in response body (RFC 7807 Problem Details).

name: Too Many Requests
description: Vượt quá giới hạn rate limit.
fix_recommendation: Respect 'Retry-After' header. Implement client-side exponential backoff.

name: Internal Server Error
description: Lỗi không xác định từ phía server.
fix_recommendation: Log stack trace internally. Return generic error message to client. Alert Dev team.

name: Bad Gateway
description: Server nhận phản hồi lỗi từ upstream service.
fix_recommendation: Retry request once. Check upstream service health.

name: Service Unavailable
description: Server quá tải hoặc đang bảo trì.
fix_recommendation: Implement Circuit Breaker pattern. Retry with backoff.

name: INVALID_ARGUMENT
description: Client specified an invalid argument.
fix_recommendation: Validate request proto fields.

name: DEADLINE_EXCEEDED
description: Request took too long to complete.
fix_recommendation: Check timeouts. Optimize query. Maybe retry if idempotent.

name: NOT_FOUND
description: Some requested entity was not found.
fix_recommendation: Return 404. Don't leak existence if security sensitive.

name: ALREADY_EXISTS
description: Entity creation failed because it already exists.
fix_recommendation: Map to HTTP 409. Suggest checking ID/Name uniqueness.

name: PERMISSION_DENIED
description: Caller does not have permission.
fix_recommendation: Check RBAC/ABAC policies.

name: UNAUTHENTICATED
description: Request does not have valid credentials.
fix_recommendation: Trigger re-authentication flow.

name: RESOURCE_EXHAUSTED
description: Quota exceeded or out of memory.
fix_recommendation: Implement backoff. Check rate limits.

name: UNAVAILABLE
description: Service is currently unavailable (transient).
fix_recommendation: This is a transient error. Safe to retry with exponential backoff.

name: unique_violation
description: Vi phạm ràng buộc duy nhất (Unique Constraint).
fix_recommendation: Catch error and return 'User/Resource already exists'. Do not leak raw DB error.

name: foreign_key_violation
description: Tham chiếu khóa ngoại không tồn tại.
fix_recommendation: Ensure referenced entities exist. Return 'Invalid reference'.

name: not_null_violation
description: Cố gắng ghi NULL vào cột NOT NULL.
fix_recommendation: Validate required fields in application logic before saving.

name: serialization_failure
description: Xung đột transaction (Deadlock hoặc Isolation level).
fix_recommendation: Retry the transaction immediately (Optimistic Locking strategy).

name: connection_failure
description: Mất kết nối tới Database.
fix_recommendation: Check DB connection pool. Implement reconnect logic.

name: Duplicate Key Error
description: Trùng lặp khóa index (thường là _id hoặc unique field).
fix_recommendation: Catch E11000. Return 'Resource already exists'.

name: DocumentValidationFailure
description: Document không khớp với schema validation.
fix_recommendation: Review inputs against BSON schema.

name: MaxTimeMSExpired
description: Query vượt quá thời gian cho phép.
fix_recommendation: Optimize query indices. Increase MaxTimeMS if necessary (cautiously).

name: Moved (Cluster)
description: Key nằm ở node khác (trong Redis Cluster).
fix_recommendation: Update Cluster Map in client driver. Driver usually handles this

name: Loading Dataset
description: Redis đang khởi động và load data từ đĩa.
fix_recommendation: Wait and retry. Service is starting up.

name: Wrong Type
description: Thao tác sai kiểu dữ liệu (VD: List command on String key).
fix_recommendation: Fix application logic. Key type mismatch.

name: Invalid Grant
description: Authorization code hoặc refresh token không hợp lệ/hết hạn.
fix_recommendation: Force user logout or re-login. Do not retry automatically.

name: Invalid Client
description: Client authentication failed (sai Client ID/Secret).
fix_recommendation: Check server-side configuration/secrets.

name: Invalid Scope
description: Scope yêu cầu không hợp lệ hoặc vượt quyền.
fix_recommendation: Request only allowed scopes. Check scope configuration.
